HSPC Departure Transport Mode value set

The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

Copyright Statement: Intermountain Healthcare HDD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-departureTransportationMode defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
14586425 Left w/ Law EnforcementThe subject departed by means of a law enforcement vehicle.

name: HSPC Departure Transport Mode value set
description: The list of codes that describe how the data came into being.

concept.definition: The subject departed by means of a law enforcement vehicle.
